import React, {useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const SignInFrom =()=>{ const [form, setForm] = useState({}) const handleOk = () => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://10.110.160.50:8008/api/users/login', form).then(res => res.data).catch(err => err) } const onChange = e => { const {name, value} = e.target; setForm(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })) } return(

) } export default SignInFrom;
